column7: Orthopedic surgeon, Dr. Aries Yerba, knows he’s smart, talented, and one of the best orthopedic surgeons not only at St. Ambrose, but in the county. So, when his abilities are questioned in the form of a medical malpractice lawsuit, anger and frustration looms as he is forced to shift his focus from his regular routine, to defending his name. Things may have come at Dr. Yerba fast, and out of the blue, but he knows he’s the best, and refuses to be broken.Attorney, Skylar Wise, doesn’t particularly care for Dr. Yerba, but her job is to defend malpractice claims to the best of her abilities. And while Dr. Yerba is cocky and self centered, she trusts her research; research that states Dr. Yerba has a perfect record. So, Skylar is more than ready to stand her ground against an ambulance chasing attorney, who's looking for a quick pay day.A remedy should be simple for these two, but the late nights and long weekends they share ignites a flame that blurs lines, and a steamy connection is instantly made. While the medical malpractice suit started out as their main focus, Aries and Skylar soon realizes they are also the remedy to one another's closed-off hearts as well.Show more

column7: Wynter Driscoll is home.The unexpected death of her estranged father has brought her back to the place where love died and a grief filled the place she could never quite grow in. As the daughter of a hoarder, she’s had more than her fair share of feeling like an afterthought… unimportant… invisible. After inheriting her childhood home, Wynter is determined to erase the painful memories of her past one box at a time. While making a fresh start, the last thing she expected to find was love.Dr. Jaxson Pierre is a single father with an ex-wife who still gives him the blues. Lately, coparenting has seemed to hit a snag and all he wants peace of mind. When a busted ankle lands a voluptuous beauty in the emergency room at St. Ambrose Hospital where he works, Jaxson has no idea that he’s just met the woman who would change his heart.Sparks fly.A fever ignites.Love blooms.What happens when you find everything you ever needed when you weren’t looking for it at all?Show more

column7: Being a doctor is Glover Israel’s passion. He tends to his patients like they are his children and takes pride in providing excellent care. He doesn’t have a good reputation among hospital staff, because he requires the same level of service from them toward his patients as well. Having to financially take care of his paraplegic father leaves little time for much of anything outside of work. The only things he can seem to find time for are carnal pleasures. He’s not looking for a relationship or anything close to love. So, he makes his rounds through potential candidates at will . . . until he literally bumps into Delaney Boutté.Loving the wrong man can be hard to overcome emotionally. Delaney Boutté learns that lesson the hard way. When her relationship starts to fizzle and she finds out about her boyfriend’s philandering ways, she chooses to get even. Doctor Glover Israel seems to be the perfect candidate, since he has the reputation of being the womanizer of St. Ambrose Memorial Hospital. She knows he’s attracted to her, and physically, she’s attracted to him too, but she knows her heart isn’t ready for anything more than the carnal pleasures he’s known for indulging in.Through their interactions at the hospital, the two quickly realize that there is more to their attraction than the physical aspect of it. Glover has nothing to lose by going for it, but Delaney feels her heart can’t withstand any more disappointment or heartbreak. Can the man that has avoided his feelings for so long convince the woman of his dreams that he’s ready for something real, or will she leave him to the proverbial streets from whence he came?Show more

column7: Sametra Andrews knows how to run into burning buildings, but facing her own emotions has been a harder fight. For seventeen years, the devoted single mother and fearless firefighter has kept life protect her son, avoid heartbreak, and never depend on a man to show up.But one rainy night shatters that plan. After a devastating car crash leaves her son Samaj hospitalized, Sametra meets Dr. Malik Holloway, a fine physical therapist with Alabama roots, healing hands, and an energy that disarms her defenses without even trying.She wasn’t looking for help. Definitely, not looking to fall. But Malik makes it too easy to do both.As Sametra rebuilds her life and wrestles with old wounds, Malik becomes more than just support. He becomes the reason she learns that love can rise from the wreckage.CRASH is a standalone.Show more

column7: Growing up watching her father habitually cheat on her mother scarred Taj Sanders in ways she didn’t recognize until she noticed the same pattern in her own relationships. When her fiancé cheats on her and gets his side chick pregnant, Taj decides she’s done with men and love altogether. A drunken night at a hotel bar puts her at the mercy of a stranger who chooses to protect her and keep her safe instead of taking advantage of her—and he makes sure no one else does either.Tristan Pierce, a quarter of the partnership for Montgomery, Pierce, Walker, and Gough, is known as the best strategist in Rose Valley Hills. When he lays eyes on Taj one year after saving her at the bar, he’s determined to not let her get away again so easily. He plays along, helping her make her ex jealous, which leads to them spending the night together. For Taj, one night is enough. For Tristan, their night together is the beginning of their forever.As fate would have it, Taj finds in Tristan a man safe enough to choose and worthy of her love. Unfortunately, that’s no longer her heart’s desire. Tristan makes it his mission to not only soften her heart to love but return her to her softness as a woman. With her hesitance to trust him and a lingering ex that won’t let go, Tristan is in for the biggest strategic undertaking of his life. Planned correctly, his actions can lead to his happily ever after with the woman he’s confident will be his wife. But one incorrect move or inadmissible action, and he may scar Taj’s heart worse than it already is.Show more

column7: Steel Gray built his empire from the ground up on control. Jaded by loss and betrayal, he spends most of his time looking for ways to grow his wealth. Love is the last thing on his mind. When Devlan Rose, a tall, free-spirited server with a crown of wild curls and a smile that thaws his cold heart drops onto his radar, something in him breaks.Devlan Rose thought her life was looking up until the night she lost her job. Dating her former boss seems like a step in the right direction, until she’s kidnapped right out of his house in the middle of the night. She soon realizes that her reclusive captor is more than sexiness cloaked in danger. He’s also the reluctant guardian to his niece and nephew, whom she now has been declared the nanny for.Devlan hated Steel’s guts even before he caused her to lose her job. Now as a prisoner in his home, she’s terrified that her boyfriend’s debt might cost her her life. Except her prison doesn’t exactly feel like a prison. The more time Devlan spends with the mysterious man with scars that run deeper than the eye can see, the less she’s compelled to escape his wrath.Steel isn’t a man who asks for what he wants, he takes it. His plan was never to take the girl, but after being robbed by his best friend, he seizes the opportunity to get what is rightfully his. Now, he’s determined to claim the woman he fell for at first glance.Show more

column7: At just twenty years old, Vincent was forced into the leadership role in one of the most ruthless crime families in Florida after the brutal murder of his father and sister. Hardened by grief, Vincent became cold and calculated, living only to expand his empire and protect the only family he had left. Love was nonexistent in a life like his.Then came Anila. She is the opposite of everything Vincent knows. An equestrian with a heart of gold and dreams of making an impact in her community. She’s no stranger to sacrifice, and falling for Vincent’s dangerously magnetic charm is the last risk she can afford to take.Vincent isn’t used to hearing the word no, and Anila isn’t used to being pursued with such intensity. Their connection is undeniable, and their passion unstoppable, but a glimpse into Vincent’s unhinged antics forces Anila to run away.In this African American Urban Romance standalone, boundaries are pushed past their limits, and the stakes rise higher than ever. column7: Life’s hardened me. A single mother to an autistic son, I learned early that love comes with lies and disappointments I can’t afford. So I swore it off. Then a mistake at the doctor’s office flipped my world upside down, and that’s when Romari appeared. He’s intense, reckless, and too sure of what he me. I swore my walls were unbreakable, but somehow, he’s kicking down every last one.I don’t know if I should run from him or finally let myself feel again.I buried my first love years ago, and with her went my heart. Or so I thought. Then I met Nakiya. From that moment, I wasn’t asking permission; I was making her mine.I don’t share. I don’t negotiate. And I don’t play about the people I love.She belongs to me, her son belongs to me, and anyone who even breathes wrong in their direction will learn why I’m called the Butcher. I’ll bleed the world dry before I let them go.Two broken souls. One love too wild to cage. But shadows always hide secrets, and betrayal never comes from where you expect it. What we’re building is worth everything, but there is someone who would rather see it destroyed. column7: General FalconLove is never supposed to make you question everything about yourself. But the love I have for Nyira is making me do exactly that. column7: JreamAs my feeling for Krown deeply evolves, I don’t want to pretend anymore. I want our union to be real, full out. So when our marriage is finalized and our wedding night is in sight, our happily ever after is cut short after overhearing a disturbing conversation. The Belafontes are prone to war with their enemies. However, the risks become immeasurable when they war amongst themselves. After enduring a heart-pounding battle of wits and strength, find out if Jream and Krown win the war of their hearts or do they meet at the crossroads.Show more
column10: Unknown

column1: Knocked Up By A Billionaire Baller
column7: Nassaya EdwardsWhen her best friend, Kimora Johnson, invites her on a trip to the Bahamas, Nassaya Edwards never imagined that the trip would shake up her entire world. She was only looking for a little sun, laughter, and a break from her usual routine. But what she got was….LaMelo Lee- NBA player. Charmer. Trouble in a six-foot-seven frame.LaMelo is used to getting what he wants—on and off the court. He’s no stranger to the spotlight, attention from women, or the perks that come with fame. But all of that became irrelevant when he encounters the quiet storm that is Nassaya Edwards. She didn’t chase him. She didn’t care about his status, his money, or his name, making her unforgettable.LaMelo is everything Nassaya swore she’d avoid. Nassaya has him rethinking everything he thought he wanted. Their chemistry is undeniable. And temptation is at an all-time high. But then… one wild, drunken night changes everything. One decision. One moment. One betrayal. InKnock Up By A Billionaire Baller, love, lies, and loyalty collide under the Bahamian sun. Find out what happens when truth is reveal and the fallout that comes with it.Show more
column10: Unknown

column1: Owned By A Ruthless Brooklynaire: A BBW Kidnap To Lovers Romance
column7: Jream LunaWhat would you do when helping a friend turns out to be a permanent punishment for you? Yep, only my good deed would have bad consequences. I just graduated from NYU with a master’s in cybersecurity and coding and wanted to celebrate with my people, only to find myself snatched up off the streets of NYC and heading to God knows where. This is what I get from slipping from my security details, again. But nothing could prepare me when I reached my destination—that looked more like myfinaldestination. Observing the watchful eyes of my captor—who has a mysterious and deadly allure that I’m drawn to—I know that I’m caught up in a world of power, money, and ever-present danger, so this is no ordinary cartel ransom. No, far from it. And this point is made even clearer once a deal is brokered between my suitor and my family. What in the hell have I gotten myself into?Krown BelafonteAfter the death of my parents and becoming a ward of the state, I’m rescued from that hellhole when my uncle finds me in a Brooklyn orphanage and then severely, savagely, and sinfully trains me to take my rightful royal place as the king of Jamaica. I was already a coldhearted, Brooklyn jawn but his training turns me into a stone-cold, mentally-ill, ruthless Brooklynaire that rules Brooklyn and Jamaica with an iron-fist, fear, wealth, and power. In my world, trust is a rare asset and loyalty can be bought and sold. With my shoddy and ominous past, no one will ever get too close to make me lose focus. Until her. The thief. And one look is all it takes to know that she ismine. When the penalty for stealing is death, how do I keep her for myself?Show more
column10: Unknown

column1: Carrying A Big Dawg's Legacy: His BBW Surrogate
column7: Shanni Monroe wasn’t out here chasing men, she was out here chasing a purpose. A BBW, beautiful, built for the grind, she’s clocking hours at the salon, stacking every dime to get her self into law school.She’s had to fend for herself, since a child, never able to catch a break. Her heart‘s been broken, her trust isnt easily earned, and love isn’t even on her radar anymore after her recent break up.but then she meets Kashmier Blackwell-the hoods most feared, and respected boss.The only thing was, he was taken by someone else.Rich, ruthless, and cold-blooded when he needs to be,Kash ain’t just a street dude, he’s a legacy in the making. But, in order to take over his fathers empire, he got to do one produce a son in the next 12 months or everything he’s built, goes to his reckless, snake, half brother.The problem is that his fiancée Amira can’t give him that baby, that he desperately needs. The real problem is that Amira‘s been keeping a dirty secret about why she can’t conceive.then Kash runs into Shanni, a woman with nothing to gain in everything to lose. Her hustle, her vibe, her curves… She is everything his life has been missing. So, when he and Amira offer her a life-changing bag, to be their surrogate, Shanni agrees, but it’s strictly business.But all hell breaks loose when cash, uncovers Amira’s betrayal.One night. One mistake. One moment of raw emotion, and now Shanni is caring, a baby… But, who’s is it?Is it the baby that Kash and Amira planned for, or did that one night of passion change everything?Now Kash is locked on Shanni and ready to claim what might be he is, for real.But with enemies, watching, Amira, spiraling, and a legacy on the line… this love triangle is about to explode.Love. Lust. Loyalty. Carrying A Big Dawg’s Legacy is araw, unhinged, urban tale…where the streets meet the sheets, and one woman finds herself caught between a thugs empire, and a heart she never expected to touch.Show more
column10: Unknown

column7: With war brewing in the streets, Luciano is determined to make things right with his wife, Pre. But when devastating truths come to light, revealing a decade of lies and life-altering secrets from those closest to him, Luciano faces critical choices that could destroy everything he's built—or finally set him free.Pre is struggling under the weight of a family she's beginning to resent. Her betrayal involving Brina has shattered her sense of trust, leading her to question everything. As Luciano’s hidden truths unravel, Pre must decide if the bond they share is strong enough to survive—or if walking away is the only path forward.Melody’s life changed forever after her accident, and now her sole focus is reclaiming who she used to be. Valentino stands firmly by her side, pushing her toward healing and strength. But when Melody uncovers a dark secret involving the infamous Frenches family, her journey toward recovery becomes a fight for survival.For Valentino, Melody isn't just his lifeline—she's his peace, the only person who sees beyond his dangerous flaws. Determined to protect her at any cost, Valentino finds himself willing to go against his own blood, risking it all for the woman who holds his heart.A Virgin Surrogate & A Underboss 2" continues the gripping saga filled with intense passion
column8: unbreakable bonds
column10: and explosive mob drama. If you're a fan of African American romance
column12: and suspenseful storytelling that leaves your heart racing
column13: you'll devour this book from Taniece and beg for more.Show more"

column17: https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/237394767-a-virgin-surrogate-a-underboss-2

column1: Surrogate To An Unhinged Mafia Boss 5: The Finale
column7: Surrogate To An Unhinged Mafia Boss 5 by BrickhouseBlood made them loyal. Love made them dangerous.Bankston DeLucahas traded his crown for the battlefield. No longer a prince, he's a warrior fighting fiercely for peace, his family's legacy, and the woman who dared to love him despite his scars.Aurmoniisn't just healing; she's reclaiming her identity, reigniting the strength and passion they tried desperately to extinguish. Their bond, forged through fire and tested by betrayal, war, and loss, is unbreakable—but the ultimate test still awaits.Warlocklurks in the shadows—calculating, patient, and deadly. His motives run deeper than mere power; he craves something more profound, something that threatens to destroy everything the Flame holds dear.In this electrifying conclusion,love becomes their greatest weapon, alliances shatter, legacies shift, and the price of loyalty has never been higher.Is this the end they've feared or the sinister start of something darker?Surrogate To An Unhinged Mafia Boss 5delivers a thrilling blend ofAfrican American romance,mafia drama, andexplosive passionthat will leave you breathless and begging for more. If you're a fan ofrich and powerful Alpha men, grippingpregnant romance, andcaptivating love storieswith high stakes, this is one finale you absolutely can't miss.Show more
column10: Unknown

column1: A Virgin Surrogate & A Underboss 3: The Finale
column7: A Virgin Surrogate & An The Finale by Taniece McDanielLuciano turned out to be the love that Pre never knew she needed. A provider, a protector, a man who did anything to make her heart smile. Four years later, she’s living the married life she never dared to dream about, holding her family together while Mel heads off to college. She thought their love was unbreakable… but grief and betrayal have a way of cracking even the strongest bonds. When tragedy strikes, Pre is left questioning everything she once believed about her marriage.After a devastating loss and with old enemies finally gone, Luciano has been enjoying peace with his family. But the past has a way of clawing back, and when buried secrets resurface, everything he’s built—and everyone he loves—is suddenly in jeopardy.Olympic gold medalist Melody has conquered her career goals and is finally ready for love. When an old flame comes back into her life, she sees a chance to have the one thing money and fame couldn’t give her—a family of her own.A Virgin Surrogate & An The Finaleis an emotional, heart-grippingAfrican American romancefilled withhood love, deep family bonds, betrayal, and second chances. Blood ties are broken, loyalty is tested, and love is pushed to its limits.If you’re a fan of Taniece’s work, gritty love stories with powerful Alpha men, and emotional urban fiction that keeps you hooked, this finale will leave you breathless and craving more.Show more
column10: Unknown

column1: The Wife Of Wolf: An Arranged Marriage
column7: The Wife Of An Arranged Marriage by Princess DiamondShe’s fire in the kitchen.He’s chaos in the Chi-Town streets—unhinged, easy on the eyes, and loyal to whatever or whoever he claims as his.When their worlds collide, love might be the most dangerous recipe of all.Annika Brownleeis done with almost-love and half-truths. Her catering hustle is finally catching, until one bad date turns dangerous—and the only man who steps between her and trouble is the one Chicago says under itsWolf.Fresh out of prison,Wolfgang “Wolf” Wildhas bigger problems than a beautiful stranger—a struggling restaurant, old favors coming due, and a daughter he’d do anything to protect. He doesn’t have room for Annika testing his patience, his pride, or his rules.They spark. They clash. In the kitchen, it’s flame meeting oil; in the quiet, one kiss says too much. And every time Wolf lets her close, the past shoves back—jealous exes, unpaid debts, a city that keeps score.When a rival hits Wolf’s business and Annika is pulled into the crossfire, the safest move is the boldestan arranged marriage of convenience.Paper vows. House rules. Ninety days to cool the streets, guard his family, and keep Annika under a name enemies won’t touch.But paper turns real fast. Late nights become soft mornings. Guarded hearts open. He learns gentle; she learns brave. And the line they swore not to cross blurs in all the right ways.As Wolf’s world is tested and whispers turn to threats, both of them have to choose—cling to the contract that kept them safe, or claim a love that could change everything.If you’re a fan of African American romance and unapologetic, dangerous alpha men who love hard and don’t play about their women,The Wife Of Wolfis for you.Show more
column10: Unknown

column1: Baby Daddy Issues: A Second Chance Romance: Standalone
column7: At eighteen,𝗦𝘆𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗿𝗲left𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗝𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗲𝘆with a broken heart and a pregnancy test kit that had her mind crashing out over a dude she wasn’t even sure about. She swore she’d never come back.Seven years later, life drags her home—with more baggage than she left with and one thing she’ll protect at all costs.𝗞𝗲𝘆𝘇used to be the city’sbeautiful problem—a handsome, low-life thug hardened by Jersey’s cold streets. Now he’shood-richand in charge, a boss whose name carries weight—feared by some, respected by most. He told himself he was over𝗦𝘆𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗿𝗲. Then she walks back in and every old feeling wakes up like it never slept.Their pull is instant. So are the scars.𝗧𝗿𝘂𝘀𝘁never came easy for either of them—jealousy, lies, and street grudgesdon’t make space for cleansecond chances. But the truth about why𝗦𝘆𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗿𝗲left won’t stay buried forever.Because thesecretshe’s been keeping isn’t just about the past.It’s about thefuture—the child he never knew existed.Suddenly “us” means more than late nights and heated words. It meansco-parentingin a city that weaponizes weakness, choosingforgivenesswhen pride feels safer, and guarding a love that’s always beendangerous—now with something priceless in the middle.If you’re into𝗔𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗔𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗿𝗼𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲, 𝗵𝗼𝗼𝗱 𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗱-𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗿𝗼𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲, and a𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗮𝗹𝗽𝗵𝗮in a𝘀𝗲𝗰𝗿𝗲𝘁 𝗯𝗮𝗯𝘆 𝘁𝘄𝗶𝘀𝘁,𝗕𝗮𝗯𝘆 𝗗𝗮𝗱𝗱𝘆 𝗜𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀Show more
column10: Unknown

column1: A Million Boss Kisses: An Urban Romance Standalone
column7: Marrying one of the most powerful men in Miami was supposed to lead to a life of love and happiness for Marissa. Instead, her marriage turned into a war zone, and the love she once clung to turned into a weapon used against her.Yaseer inherited a financial empire and built his legacy on dominance and discipline. Between raising his daughter and expanding his empire, women have stayed at the bottom of his priority list until the moment he laid eyes on Marissa. His fixation on the wild-eyed beauty is instant, and for a man like Yaseer, wanting something meant owning it completely.In this Urban Romance standalone, their worlds collide on a crash course with fate. Marissa isn’t looking for another unhinged man to consume her life, but Yaseer isn’t playing fair. He is pulling up, and stepping on every obstacle on his mission to claim her heart.Show more
column10: African American Romance; Found Family; He Falls First

column7: Change is inevitable, even when we’re set in our ways. Life always has a way of transforming those plans.Rennix has spent most of his life playing game after game until he just wanted solitude. Then out of nowhere he’s blinded by siblings he never knew existed, and a woman who refuses to give him the time of day. Gentleman’s club owner by night, and human craving something else by day. He and his twin Reminisce are far from home, in a new city with new rules. A change he didn’t see coming is on the horizon, because for once he realizes that what he thought he wanted he didn’t.Caya is healing…or at least trying to. Her goal is to give her son what she never had. However healing isn’t linear, and everything happens in its own time. The last thing she intended was to find herself craving the very man she knew would challenge her healing. Propositioned for one night, she turns him down … Only then forced to see him in a new light. One she didn’t see possible until he was lying in her bed telling her to go to sleep.She told herself he wasn’t the kind of man she needed in her life— outspoken, rude and owned a strip club. The thing is her body had a plan of it’s own. Not only that, but the beginning of a friendship neither of them knew they needed brings forth a boatload of transition? The type of change neither of them saw coming until it was too late.Show more
column10: African American

column7: The saying goes, “Favor ain’t fair.”Well, as far asXarielle Simpsonis concerned, the lack of favor ain’t all that fair, either. Xarielle’s always been a dreamer. Even as a little girl, she spent her free-time daydreaming about a life that was much different than the one she was living. She dreamt of a life where mothers stuck around, families were loving, and opportunities to better your situation with dedication and hard work were actually realistic.In her real life… her mother left, her family is toxic, and her job, though she loves it, has her on the fast-track to nowhere. When her best friend tells her about the opportunity to work as a nanny for a wealthy acquaintance in the oceanside town of Jackson Island, Xarielle can’t help but dream about the opportunities.Kept Boudreauxis a wealthy entrepreneur and the single father of two little girls. He never planned to be a single-father, but that’s what happens when you’re attracted to what’s familiar. He chose a mother for his children who was exactly like his own mother—a woman who felt stifled and choked by the demands of motherhood.When his precarious childcare situation falls apart, his back is against the wall. His cousin might have a solution. Her best friend is looking to make a change. She might be perfect for the position. Against the backdrop of the beauty and tranquility of Jackson Island, will two people searching for something… different, start to see it in each other?Show more
column10: African American Romance

column7: Mila Cruz never imagined that her marriage would have taken the turn it did. She has to start over from scratch with her six-year old son while angry at the world. With shattered trust, she has sworn off men for the rest of her life and is only focused on providing for her son.While working a server shift, Mila meets the sought-after real estate tycoon Tremaine Houston. Their first interaction leaves a sour taste in each other’s mouths. Tremaine doesn’t understand why a woman so beautiful could be so angry. However after learning the reason behind why Mila is so upset, Tremaine steps in to help her.Tremaine can’t avoid his attraction for Mila. He is drawn to her and can’t help but think of ways to be one of the men in the world she doesn’t despise. He begins to break through those barriers with words and actions. He’s willing to show Mila that not all love hurts.Show more
column10: Unknown

column7: Securefeeling safe, stable, and free from fear or anxiety.Brielle Chambers is a social media influencer with a sunshine personality. She loves to see the positive in everything and everyone. She’s built her platform with her authentic self, which has awarded her six-figure brand deals. Even after a tragic loss, she remains optimistic about life and love.Secureprotect against threats; make safe.James Hill is a security guard for the city’s most popular club. He is a six foot, five inch wall of pure muscle. People feel his presence before anyone sees him. He is a guarded and closed off man who has sworn off relationships . . . until he meetsher.Brielle is the light in James’s dark life. She lights a spark in him that challenges everything he’s ever believed about love. The two of them are like moths to a flame, unable to fight the call of their bodies to one another. Will their love prevail, or will their connection burn to ashes in this romantic love story?Show more
column10: African American; African American Romance; Romance; Novella

column7: She went next door to scream at him. She ended up moaning underneath him.Abril Severs swore off men the day she found her ex-fiancé at the altar with another woman. One year later, she’s upholding her promise—no flings, no drama, and no arrogant, tattooed, sexy neighbors who blast music at ungodly hours. But when she storms next door to confront July Maxwell, she doesn’t expect to find him in a compromising position and herself as a voyeur.She should’ve looked away, but she couldn’t. She should’ve walked away, but she didn’t.July has relegated women to one purpose in his life after his ex-fiancée ripped his heart out and tossed it in the trash. So, when his feisty neighbor wanders into his house with attitude and a body made for sin, he does the only thing he can—extend a personal invitation to his private party.Abril gets more than she bargained for between tangled sheets and sinful cravings when July tugs at her no-strings rule and quickly unravels it. Two broken vows. One scorching attraction. Zero possibility they’ll make it out untarnished.Show more
column10: African American Romance

column1: His Strings Make Her Legs Sing
column7: The pick of strings can spread legs, but the flow of a voice can bring love. Arzeniq Citrell Wick is a master with the guitar whose heart yearns for just the right melody in just the right woman. When he meets Sundae Whekli Jacobs, her voice has just the right elements to take the notes from the sheet music to his heart. Will they come together to make beautiful music, or will an untuned instrument wreak havoc on what should be the most beautiful arrangement made from love?Find out in His Strings Make Her Legs Sing.
column10: African American Romance

column7: Devyn Logan has been with her boyfriend, Maurice, for five years. He’s not perfect, but he’s hers, and she convinces herself that’s all that matters. The only thing missing is marriage and the family she’s always wanted. Although she doesn’t want to pressure him into proposing, time and her biological clock are ticking.Those who know Tariq Thompson well know him as fun-loving and outgoing. However, as he’s grown older and matured, he prefers to watch and observe from the background, which works in his favor for more reasons than he’s willing to admit.For years, he’s sat back and watched the man he once thought of as his best friend mishandle Devyn, the most beautiful, loyal, and genuine woman he’s ever had the pleasure of knowing. He finds himself offering her a listening ear and giving her a shoulder to lean on when Maurice continues to drop the ball.One night, Devyn discovers some devastating news, and as usual, Tariq is there to comfort her. He finds himself confessing things to Devyn that he shouldn’t, and one thing leads to another.When things go too far, will Devyn and Tariq pump the brakes and pretend as if nothing has happened or throw caution to the wind and explore the feelings they’ve been ignoring?Show more
column10: Unknown

column7: Three months ago, Kareem Dorsey was supposed to be nothing more than a distant memory.Just the handsome stranger who put me through the mattress in the middle of a hurricane.The career criminal who made me laugh almost as hard as he made me c*m.NOT the father of my unborn baby.But fate doesn’t care about the safeguards we put around our hearts or the lines we drew in the sand.It only cares about the here and now.And right now? He’s everything I’m not supposed to want in a man—impulsive, too charming for his own good, dangerous, and not to mention a Gemini.And when he finds out about the baby he put inside me? All bets are off. At least for him.Will he be able to convince me to take a chance on love for the sake of our unborn child, or will the mistakes of his past keep us apart forever?Show more
column10: Unknown

column7: From award-winning author R. F. Kuang comesBabel,a historical fantasy epic that grapples with student revolutions, colonial resistance, and the use of language and translation as the dominating tool of the British EmpireTraduttore, traditore:An act of translation is always an act of betrayal.1828. Robin Swift, orphaned by cholera in Canton, is brought to London by the mysterious Professor Lovell. There, he trains for years in Latin, Ancient Greek, and Chinese, all in preparation for the day he’ll enroll in Oxford University’s prestigious Royal Institute of Translation—also known as Babel. The tower and its students are the world's center for translation and, more importantly, magic. Silver-working—the art of manifesting the meaning lost in translation using enchanted silver bars—has made the British unparalleled in power, as the arcane craft serves the Empire's quest for colonization.For Robin, Oxford is a utopia dedicated to the pursuit of knowledge. But knowledge obeys power, and as a Chinese boy raised in Britain, Robin realizes serving Babel means betraying his motherland. As his studies progress, Robin finds himself caught between Babel and the shadowy Hermes Society, an organization dedicated to stopping imperial expansion. When Britain pursues an unjust war with China over silver and opium, Robin must decide . . .Can powerful institutions be changed from within, or does revolution always require violence?Show more
column10: Fantasy; Historical Fiction; Dark Academia; Fiction; Historical; Audiobook; Adult

column10: Fantasy; Historical Fiction; Dark Academia; Fiction; Historical; Audiobook; Adult

column7: Magic has made the city of Tiran an industrial utopia, but magic has a cost—and the collectors have come calling.An orphan since the age of four, Sciona has always had more to prove than her fellow students. For twenty years, she has devoted every waking moment to the study of magic, fueled by a mad desire to achieve the impossible: to be the first woman ever admitted to the High Magistry. When she finally claws her way up the ranks to become a highmage, however, she finds that her challenges have just begun. Her new colleagues will stop at nothing to let her know she is unwelcome, beginning with giving her a janitor instead of a qualified lab assistant.What neither Sciona nor her peers realize is that her taciturn assistant was once more than a janitor; before he mopped floors for the mages, Thomil was a nomadic hunter from beyond Tiran’s magical barrier. Ten years have passed since he survived the perilous crossing that killed his family. But working for a highmage, he sees the opportunity to finally understand the forces that decimated his tribe, drove him from his homeland, and keep the Tiranish in power.Through their fractious relationship, mage and outsider uncover an ancient secret that could change the course of magic forever—if it doesn’t get them killed first. Sciona has defined her life by the pursuit of truth, but how much is one truth worth with the fate of civilization in the balance?A standalone dark academia brimming with mystery, tragedy, and the damning echoes of the past. For fans of Leigh Bardugo, V. E. Schwab, and Fullmetal Alchemist.(Content warnings for gore, sexual assault, and suicidal ideation)Show more
column10: Fantasy; Dark Academia; Fiction; Audiobook; Adult; Book Club; Magic

Robin Swift, orphaned by cholera in Canton, is brought to London by the mysterious Professor Lovell. There, he trains for years in Latin, Ancient Greek, and Chinese, all in preparation for the day he’ll enroll in Oxford University’s prestigious Royal Institute of Translation—also known as Babel. The tower and its students are the world's center for translation and, more importantly, magic. Silver-working—the art of manifesting the meaning lost in translation using enchanted silver bars—has made the British unparalleled in power, as the arcane craft serves the Empire's quest for colonization.For Robin, Oxford is a utopia dedicated to the pursuit of knowledge. But knowledge obeys power, and as a Chinese boy raised in Britain, Robin realizes serving Babel means betraying his motherland. As his studies progress, Robin finds himself caught between Babel and the shadowy Hermes Society, an organization dedicated to stopping imperial expansion. When Britain pursues an unjust war with China over silver and opium, Robin must decide . . .Can powerful institutions be changed from within, or does revolution always require violence?Show more
